svg.text: McCzarny recently made several updates to his
ghsummary project. He added support for
specifying user pronouns in the generated
summary. He also refined the summary generation
process, updating the Gemini API model to
Gemini 2.5 preview and flash versions. These
updates included refining system prompts for
conciseness and SVG compatibility. In his
git-simulator-ai-slop repository, McCzarny
significantly improved the user interface. He
added a "Reset" button to the Git Explorer and
implemented floating, draggable controls with
collapse/expand functionality. He also focused
on deployment, implementing GitHub Pages
publishing for the Next.js application. This
involved adding and refining GitHub Actions
workflows for deployment and updating
configurations. He ensured the deployed site
was linked in the README and made adjustments
to the export process. Other changes included
updating branch triggers for deployment and
removing draggable attributes from commit nodes.
Generated on: Sun Jun 29 02:08:48 2025
